ModMetaData.name: Take Your Pills - Dev Build
ModMetaData.author: Trevir01
ModMetaData.description: You remember those times in college where you would just take some pills and learning was done by itself? (This is the dev version of Take Your Pills. The release version of About.xml is available for editing at About/About-Release.xml. Edits made on this file or on the temporary About/About.xml won't show up on the release version. Use VisualStudio to build a "Release" version of this mod when ready to upload your mod!)
